  proposition: Yingkai Dong et al. published a paper on jailbreaking text-to-image models using LLM-based agents.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yingkai Dong|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yingkai Dong|RESEARCHED|LLM-based agents
    Yingkai Dong|STUDIED|text-to-image models

  proposition: Zhen Tan et al. explored covert injection of malice into multimodal large language model (MLLM) societies.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zhen Tan|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhen Tan|RESEARCHED|Multimodal large language model
    Zhen Tan|EXPLORED|malice injection

  proposition: Shenglai Zeng et al. proposed mitigating privacy issues in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) using synthetic data.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Shenglai Zeng|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Shenglai Zeng|RESEARCHED|retrieval-augmented generation
    Shenglai Zeng|PROPOSED|privacy mitigation

  proposition: Xiusi Chen et al. developed ITERALIGN for iterative constitutional alignment of large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xiusi Chen|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Xiusi Chen|DEVELOPED|ITERALIGN
    ITERALIGN|USED_FOR|large language model alignment

  proposition: Saffron Huang et al. presented Collective Constitutional AI, aligning language models with public input at the ACM Conference on Fairness, Accountability, and Transparency.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Saffron Huang|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Saffron Huang|PRESENTED|Collective Constitutional AI
    Collective Constitutional AI|PRESENTED_AT|ACM Conference on Fairness, Accountability, and Transparency

  proposition: Savvas Petridis et al. created Constitutionmaker, an interactive tool for critiquing large language models by converting feedback into principles.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Savvas Petridis|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Savvas Petridis|CREATED|Constitutionmaker
    Constitutionmaker|USED_FOR|large language model critique

  proposition: Wenyue Hua et al. introduced TrustAgent for developing safe and trustworthy LLM-based agents through agent constitution.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Wenyue Hua|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Wenyue Hua|INTRODUCED|TrustAgent
    TrustAgent|USED_FOR|LLM-based agent development

  proposition: Luke Yoffe et al. proposed DebUnc to mitigate hallucinations in large language model agent communication using uncertainty estimations.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Luke Yoffe|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Luke Yoffe|PROPOSED|DebUnc
    DebUnc|USED_FOR|hallucination mitigation

  proposition: Rong Zhou et al. developed TTT-UNet for enhancing biomedical image segmentation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Rong Zhou|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Rong Zhou|DEVELOPED|TTT-UNet
    TTT-UNet|USED_FOR|biomedical image segmentation

  proposition: Qian Yang et al. explored calibrating clinicians' trust in AI decision support systems using biomedical literature.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Qian Yang|PUBLISHED|research paper
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Qian Yang|RESEARCHED|AI decision support systems
